meanings.sent1: The westernmost house on the street had a beautiful view of the sunset.
meanings.sent2: The westernmost point of the country is where the sun sets.
meanings.sent3: The cowboy always joked that his hat was the westernmost in the wild west.
meanings.sent4: The westernmost edge of the map seemed like the end of the world.
meanings.sent5: The westernmost mountain stood tall against the evening sky.

meanings.sent1: The ship sailed towards the westernmost to explore new lands.
meanings.sent2: The compass always pointed towards the westernmost.
meanings.sent3: The treasure map led the pirates to the westernmost of the island.
meanings.sent4: The westernmost of the desert seemed endless under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent5: The westernmost of the forest was shrouded in mystery and legend.
